ionic.content:
<ion-header [translucent]="true"> <ion-toolbar> <ion-buttons slot="start"> <ion-back-button icon="caret-back"></ion-back-button> </ion-buttons> <ion-title>Retour</ion-title> </ion-toolbar> </ion-header>
<ion-content [fullscreen]="true"> <ion-header [translucent]="true"> <ion-toolbar> <ion-title>Page Ajout</ion-title> </ion-toolbar> </ion-header> <ion-card> <ion-card-header> <ion-card-title>Formulaire</ion-card-title> <ion-card-subtitle>INSERTION #Classe# </ion-card-subtitle> </ion-card-header>
<ion-card-content> #inputs# <ion-button fill="outline" expand="block" (click)="save#Classe#()"> <ion-icon name="add"></ion-icon> </ion-button>
</ion-card-content> </ion-card> </ion-content>
